description:
This course will make you able to override one of the prime subjects in Mathematics called Differentiation. After successful accomplishment of this particular course, you will have a deep grip on differential equations. The way of teaching comprises of basic definitions, theoretical explanation and complete solutions of numerical problems. Each topic carries plenty of examples with all the relevant steps/sub steps to make sure there’s no room for ambiguity. Since it was planned to provide complete pdf of this course, therefore all the numerical examples have typed in Microsoft word. All the hard points have been revealed explicitly by doing extra calculations aside.

NOTE: This whole course has been compiled in the attached downloadable pdf files. Check a sample in preview (Section 11 - Lecture 52)

Content of the course is

  1. Bernoulli Equations
  2. Homogeneous and Non Homogeneous Equations
  3. Lagrange’s Mean Value Theorem
  4. Linear Differential Equations
  5. Maxima and Manima
  6. Partial Differentiation
  7. Polynomial Differential Equations
  8. Separable Differential Equations
  9. Total or Exact Differential Equations
title: Learn Differential Equations
